title: Did Will Smith ATTACK Dave Chappelle?! Douglas Murray LIVE In Studio
description:
Dave Chappelle was attacked live on stage during a show. The good news is the assailant was left a broken heap. The bad news is what this means for comedians when people feel entitled to attack them for jokes they don't like. Also, we recap all the best Roe v. Wade meltdowns. And we're joined by special guest Douglas Murray! #DaveChappelle #NetflixIsAJoke #SCOTUS #ROEvWADE #Abortion 

NEW MERCH! https://crowdershop.com/
